title: LEAVERBUSTER
body:
Riot u didnt let me update the game which didnt let me play. Now i have a 20 minutes leaver?!?!? LIKE RIOT CAN YOU FIX THAT AND GET RID OF MY LEAVER PLEASE. Please if this game is global make so good changes not bad changes.

~FIX IT AND GET RID OF THE LEAVER ON MY ACCOUNT

Account: Toyota Rice

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, we're unable to remove Leaverbuster penalties for any reason. Regardless of your own intent, disconnecting from matches negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This is actually a big reason why the system treats all disconnections as equal and why we cannot modify penalties.

If you can dive into more details regarding the issue you're experiencing with updating, we can troubleshoot and resolve it together. ^.^

They won't ever remove [LeaverBuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)punishments from accounts and you need to wait through them.  Also to get a 20 LPQ it means that you already went through a 5 and 10 minute LPQs in the past from afks.
